channel.title: Client Compatability
channel.description: My server is compatable with bluurrs client. But whenever you do any other client, you are bugged and your head is all wobbly etc. Is there a way on how i can make it so i can use a different client?

item.title: Client Compatability
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

My server is compatable with bluurrs client. But whenever you do any other client, you are bugged and your head is all wobbly etc. Is there a way on how i can make it so i can use a different client?
